snippet: Japan reopened a small part of the 12-mile evacuation zone around the destroyed Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, allowing residents to return to live in their homes for the first time since the accident three years ago.
abstract: Japan reopens small part of 12-mile evacuation zone around destroyed Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, allowing residents to return to live in their homes for first time since 2011 accident.
lead_paragraph: Japan reopened a small part of the 12-mile evacuation zone around the destroyed Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, allowing residents to return to live in their homes for the first time since the accident three years ago.
